title: Blue Highway / Interstate with cyrillic (Russian) charset
content:
Hi,

I want to reproduce this sign:  
 [http://pix.alaporte.net/pub/d/20273-1/Berlin+Wall+-+You+are+Leaving+the+...](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310171814/http:/pix.alaporte.net/pub/d/20273-1/Berlin+Wall+-+You+are+Leaving+the+American+Sector.JPG "http://pix.alaporte.net/pub/d/20273-1/Berlin+Wall+-+You+are+Leaving+the+American+Sector.JPG")

and do already know that the font used there is (at least close to) Blue Highway or Interstate:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/blue-highway.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310171814/http:/www.dafont.com/blue-highway.font "http://www.dafont.com/blue-highway.font")

However, Blue Highway does not containt cyrillic (Russian) chars.

So do you know maybe a similar font containing them?

Cheers,  
jorges
author: jorges

comments.content:
<cite>and do already know that the font used there is (at least close to) Blue </cite>  
Actually, the typeface seems more a bad stencil work.  
If you would like to retain that feeling, I would advise to look for something less regular than Interstate.
